recipes.name: Classic Spaghetti Bolognese
preparation: Cook spaghetti pasta according to package instructions.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add minced garlic and diced onion, cook until translucent.
Add ground beef, season with salt and black pepper. Cook until browned.
Stir in tomato sauce and simmer for 15-20 minutes.
Serve hot over cooked spaghetti, garnish with grated Parmesan cheese.

recipes.name: Homemade Chicken Tikka Masala
ingredients: Spices (cumin, coriander, turmeric, paprika, garam masala)
preparation: Marinate chicken breast in yogurt and spices for at least 1 hour.
In a skillet, melt butter and sauté diced onion, garlic, and ginger until fragrant.
Add marinated chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in tomato puree and cream, simmer until chicken is cooked through.
Serve hot with rice or naan bread.

reviews.comment: Amazing flavors! Will make it again.
Great recipe but a bit spicy for me.

recipes.name: Classic Margherita Pizza
preparation: Preheat oven to 450°F (230°C).
Roll out pizza dough on a floured surface and transfer to a baking sheet.
Spread tomato sauce over the dough, leaving a border around the edges.
Tear mozzarella cheese and distribute evenly over the sauce.
Drizzle olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Bake in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.
Garnish with fresh basil leaves before serving.

recipes.name: Creamy Alfredo Pasta
preparation: Cook fettuccine pasta according to package instructions.
In a saucepan, melt butter and sauté minced garlic until fragrant.
Pour in heavy cream and simmer until slightly thickened.
Stir in grated Parmesan cheese, salt, and black pepper.
Add cooked pasta to the sauce, toss until well coated.
Serve hot, garnished with fresh parsley.

recipes.name: Grilled Salmon with Lemon Butter
preparation: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Season salmon fillets with salt and pepper.
Grill salmon for 5-6 minutes on each side, or until cooked through.
In a small saucepan, melt butter and sauté minced garlic until fragrant.
Squeeze lemon juice into the butter, add chopped fresh dill.
Pour lemon butter sauce over grilled salmon before serving.

recipes.name: Vegetarian Stir-Fried Noodles
preparation: Cook rice noodles according to package instructions.
In a wok or skillet, heat sesame oil over medium-high heat.
Stir-fry minced garlic and ginger until fragrant.
Add tofu and cook until golden brown.
Add sliced bell peppers, broccoli, and carrots, stir-fry until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Toss in cooked rice noodles and soy sauce, stir until well combined.
Garnish with chopped green onions and bean sprouts before serving.

recipes.name: BBQ Pulled Pork Sandwich
preparation: Rub pork shoulder with salt and pepper.
Place in a slow cooker with sliced onion and minced garlic.
Pour BBQ sauce over the pork and cook on low for 8 hours.
Shred the cooked pork using two forks.
Assemble pulled pork sandwiches with buns and coleslaw.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
preparation: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a mixing bowl, cream together butter and sugars until smooth.
Beat in egg and vanilla extract.
Combine flour, baking soda, and salt; gradually stir into the creamed mixture.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 8-10 minutes until edges are lightly browned.
Cool on baking sheets for a few minutes before transferring to wire racks to cool completely.
